response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly enhance your business operations. Given its high value and unique features, I estimate its worth to be $12,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it for $9,500. This price reflects a fair balance between the product's value and your budget, ensuring that you receive a valuable asset without overextending your resources. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this product to your business.", "product_price": 9500}
